Settings: Shuffles skills among jobs. By default, all skills among all jobs are shuffled.
This ensures each job will only get one Divine Skill, each remaining in the eight slot.
Skills from the 4 advanced jobs will be kept separate from the 8 base jobs.
For example, the Apothecary's skill Amputate could change from using an axe to a staff, allowing for either the Cleric or Scholar to use it.
Adjusts SP costs of skills by up to 30%.
Adjusts JP costs to learn skills. Costs will always increase with each skill learned.
Randomly adjusts power of all offensive skills by up to 30%.
Support skills from the 4 advanced jobs with be kept separate from the 8 base jobs.
Shuffles bonuses for each stats among jobs.
Randomly shuffle stats
PCs can become insanely powerful or useless.
Fairly shuffle stats
Bonus stats totals are preserved for each job (i.e. 28% for base jobs and 40% for advanced jobs).

Shuffle separately
